meanings.definition: The wife or widow of a viscount.
meanings.sent1: The viscountesses attended the royal ball with grace.
meanings.sent2: She became a viscountess after marrying the nobleman.
meanings.sent3: The viscountesses giggled as they tried on extravagant gowns for the event.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and elegance made her the viscountess of the town.
meanings.sent5: The viscountesses' presence added a touch of sophistication to the gathering.

meanings.definition: A woman holding the rank of viscountess.
meanings.sent1: The viscountesses in the court were admired for their poise.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to be one of the viscountesses in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The viscountesses shared stories of their travels with laughter.
meanings.sent4: In her role as a viscountess, she led charitable initiatives in the community.
meanings.sent5: The viscountesses' titles symbolized their noble status in society.
